text: Logo agar tumhen marney kay baad ji uthney mein shak hai to socho hum ney tumhen mitti say peda kiya phir nutfay say phir khoon basta say phir gosht kay lothray say jo soorat diya gaya tha aur bey naqsha tha. Yeh hum tum per zahir ker detay hain aur hum jissay chahayen aik thehraye huye waqt tak reham-e-madir mein rakhtay hain phir tumhen bachpan ki halat mein duniya mein latay hain phir takay tum apni poori jawani ko phoncho tum mein say baaz to woh hain jo fot ker liye jatay hain aur baaz bey gharz umar ki taraf phir say lota diye jatay hain kay woh aik cheez say ba-khabar honey kay baad phir bey khabar hojaye. Tu dekhta hai kay zamin (banjar aur) khusk hai phir jab hum uss per barishen barsatay hain to woh ubharti hai aur phoolti hai aur her qisam ki ronaq daar nabataat ugati hai
